metadata.title: CVE-2019-11454 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) in http/cervlet.c in Tildeslash Monitbefore 5.25.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to introducearbitrary JavaScript via manipulation of an unsanitized user field of theAuthorization header for HTTP Basic Authentication, which is mishandledduring an _viewlog operation.

criterions.comment: monit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
